question: A rough outline map of northern Sri Lanka is shown in the figure. Jaffna is located at the point marked
explanation: Jaffna is the capital city of the Northern Province of Sri Lanka. It is the administrative headquarters of the Jaffna District located on a peninsula of the same name. Jaffna is situated at the ‘D’ point in the given figure. Jaffna is the location in Srilanka, where the L.T.T.E group is very active and has a stronghold.
